Detailed Description

Timer APIs.

This file contains the device abstraction layer APIs for Timer.

Function Documentation

static void TimerWaitForWrite ( uint32_t  reg,
uint32_t  baseAddr 
)
inlinestatic

This function will check for write POSTED status.

Parameters
regRegister whose status has to be checked

'reg' can take the following values
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCLR - Timer Control register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCRR - Timer Counter register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TLDR - Timer Load register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TTGR - Timer Trigger register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TMAR - Timer Match register

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
